headline: Bitcoin ETFs Absorb $697M in Largest Single-Day Inflow Since October
summary: U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs began the first full trading week of 2026 with a powerful capital rotation, absorbing a net inflow of approximately $697 million on Monday, January 5.Data from multiple sources, including SoSoValue, confirms that this is the largest single-day inflow since October 7, 2025, indicating a decisive return ...

headline: Coinbase Exec Warns Quantum Computing Threatens 33% of Bitcoin Supply – Here’s Why
summary: A warning from a senior Coinbase executive has reignited concerns about how quantum computing could one day reshape Bitcoin’s security, with new estimates suggesting that roughly a third of the network’s total supply could be exposed under certain conditions.David Duong, Global Head of Investment Research at Coinbase, said in a ...

headline: Morgan Stanley Plans to Launch Bitcoin and Solana ETFs
summary: Morgan Stanley plans to launch exchange-traded funds holding two major digital tokens, bitcoin and solana, in the latest instance of traditional finance embracing cryptocurrencies. The investment bank has submitted applications to the Securities and Exchange Commission for the ETFs, filings showed Tuesday.

headline: BlackRock Sees Prospect of 'Very Exciting' Copper Market
summary: Evy Hambro, head of fundamental equities thematic and sector investing at BlackRock, discusses the outlook for copper prices and the economic transition in China, Europe and the US on commodity markets. "We're seeing this kind of industrial activity. We're seeing this move away from fossil fuels towards kind of renewable power. We're seeing this increased electrification. We're seeing AI. We're seeing all of these pressures building and they need commodities to solve them," Hambro tells Bloomberg Television.

headline: Bitcoin ETFs Post Largest Inflow since October Crash: Here’s What’s Important
summary: US spot Bitcoin ETFs saw a sharp return of capital on Jan. 5, with total net inflows reaching $697 million. This was the strongest single day of inflows since the market crash in October 2025. The move came as Bitcoin opened the year strong and gained around 7.5% over the ...

headline: Bitcoin ETFs See Biggest Inflow in 3 Months as BlackRock Signals Crypto’s Structural Shift
summary: Bitcoin ETFs logged their biggest inflow in three months as BlackRock signals crypto’s shift from speculation to financial infrastructure.
